title: Probe molecular diffusivity in single ternary inorganic-organic microdroplets via interfacial ozonolysis of thiosulfate

In this study, the aqueous sodium thiosulfate microdroplets mixed with glucose or sucrose are used as a model system of ternary inorganic-organic aerosols. The interfacial ozone oxidation of thiosulfate, which...
